name: Trooper (Darren Contreras)
description:
I am an aspiring game developer from New Zealand whose passion is into world building , creating characters and assets in a style that is looking to always convey a sense of fun. Currently I am a full-time First Year Game Art Student doing a Bachelor of Creative Technologies at Media Design School, New Zealand (2021). Trooper is a 2-D game project/assignment for semester 1.

Contact me:
darrenreyescontreras@gmail.com

Music Credits:
"Phobia" - Elysium Audio Labs | "Broken Piano " - by Vivek Abhishek | "Haunted" - by Ross Bugden | "Ethereal Sunday" - by TeknoAXE  | "Cave Atmosphere" - by RadioCity
